content.p: Our facilities The University of Nottingham has excellent facilities and we’re continuously investing in spaces for students. Across our UK campuses you'll find: *In 2022-23, three libraries opened 24/7 for most of term-time. We’re here for you every step of the way, with a network of support services built around your needs. Our Student Service Centres can help with a range of topics, incuding: You can also get support from your personal tutor or Here For You Guide, or by contacting the Students' Union Advice team. How to apply Fees and funding
